author: upayavira
msg: Checksum testing of pages once generated. They're now only saved if the checksum is different.
This allows improved uploading, e.g. with Ant, but does not speed the building of the site itself.
It is accessed by adding a <checksums-uri> node into cli.xconf containing a filename referring to a file to store the checksums.
Note: this should not be considered stable - I will probably improve upon it which will change the way it is configured.
